section.p: This class represents a reference to specific type of information object that may be referenced by a policy or consent directive (e.g., document, order, etc.). This information object refers to the types of objects that may be used in a permission.

ol.li:
Contains zero or one [0..1] category with data type Code
Coded attribute that identifies the type of object referenced in the policy.

Contains zero or one [0..1] category with data type Code
Coded attribute that identifies the type of object referenced in the policy.
